text: Fall of Kabul is an event where Kabul is captured. Some of these include: * Battle of Kabul (1992â€“1996), the capture of Kabul by the Taliban in 1996 * Fall of Kabul (2001), the capture of Kabul by the Northern Alliance in 2001, as a part of the United States invasion of Afghanistan * Fall of Kabul (2021), the recapture of Kabul by the Taliban in 2021
title: Fall of Kabul
